Detailed Description

This method returns the height of the ground under pos.

Member Function Documentation

virtual int CRCClosestTriangle::operator() ( const ChunkObstacle &  obstacle,
const WorldTriangle &  triangle,
float  dist 
) [inline, virtual]

User-defined method to check a collision.

Parameters:
obstacle the obstacle contains the triangle that collides the ray
triangle the world triangle that collides the ray
dist the distance between the collision point and the source of the ray
Returns:
- COLLIDE_BEFORE for interested in collisions before this,
  • COLLIDE_AFTER for interested in collisions after it, or
  • COLLIDE_ALL for interested in collisions before and after
  • COLLIDE_STOP for done
Note:
The dist returned from the collide function is whatever was passed into the last callback call, or -1 if there were none.

The WorldTriangle is in the co-ordinate system of the ChunkObstacle, and only exists for the duration of the call.

Reimplemented from CollisionCallback.
